00020                 {
00021                         return $this->is_external() ?
00022                                 sprintf("diario/go/%s", $this->id) :
00023                                 sprintf("diario/read/%s", $this->id);
00024                 }

00030                 function is_external()
00031                 {
00032                         return $this->external_url != NULL;
00033                 }

00040                 {
00041                         $this->status = 'approvato';
00042                 }
00043

00049                 {
00050                         $this->status = 'rimosso';
00051                 }

00057                 public function find_unapproved()
00058                 {
00059                         return $this->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`status` != 'approvato'"));
00060                 }

00066                 public function find_approved()
00067                 {
00068                         return $this->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`status` = 'approvato'"));
00069                 }

00076                 public function trackback_url()
00077                 {
00078                         return sprintf("http://%s%strackback/diario/%s",
00079                                 $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'],
00080                                 APPLICATION_ROOT,
00081                                 $this->id);

00090                 {
00091                         return $this->permalink(FALSE) . '#comments';

00098                 public function rfc2822_date()
00099                 {
00100                         return date('r', strtotime($this->created_at));
00101                 }
00102

00108                 {

00117                 {

00126                 {
00127                         return strip_tags($this->text);
00128                 }

00137                 public function summary($relative = TRUE)
00138                 {
00139                         $stripped = $this->get_stripped_text();
00140                         $off = strpos($stripped, " ", min(250, strlen($stripped)));
00141                         if ($off !== FALSE)
00142                         {
00143                                 return substr($stripped, 0, $off) . "&hellip; " .
00144                                         a(l('Read more'), array('href' => $this->permalink($relative)));
00145                         }
00146                         return $stripped;
00147                 }
00148 
00153                 public function comma_separated_tags()
00154                 {
00155                         $tags = $this->tags;
00156                         return Tag::join($tags);
00157                 }
00158 
00163                 public static function sort_posts($a, $b)
00164                 {
00165                         return (strtotime($a->created_at) > strtotime($b->created_at)) ? -1 : 1;
00166                 }
00167 
00172                 public function previous()
00173                 {
00174                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00175                         $factory = new self();
00176                         $results = $factory->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`created_at` < '{$conn->escape($this->created_at)}' " .
00177                                 "AND `status` = 'pubblicato'",
00178                                 'order_by' => '`created_at` DESC',
00179                                 'limit' => 1));
00180                         $ret = count($results) > 0 ? $results[0] : NULL;
00181                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00182                         return $ret;
00183                 }
00184 
00189                 public function next()
00190                 {
00191                         $conn = Db::get_connection();
00192                         $factory = new self();
00193                         $results = $factory->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`created_at` > '{$conn->escape($this->created_at)}' " .
00194                                 "AND `status` = 'pubblicato'",
00195                                 'order_by' => '`created_at` ASC',
00196                                 'limit' => 1));
00197                         $ret = count($results) > 0 ? $results[0] : NULL;
00198                         Db::close_connection($conn);
00199                         return $ret;
